sentence: In early trading on Tuesday, shares of Walmart topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 0.2%.
Year to date, Walmart has lost about 14.4% of its value.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Home Depot, trading down 1.7%.
Home Depot is lower by about 0.9% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Microsoft, trading down 1.6%, and Walt Disney, trading up 0.2% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
